get.description:
If no `Location` is provided, all matter types from all locations will be returned (paginated)
Sample request:
            
    GET /mattertypes

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Searches for partial match on matter type name

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific location. In the US API this is the ANSI 2 letter state code (e.g. IL, NY). In the AU API this is shorthand state code (e.g. NSW, ACT, etc)

parameters.name: Category
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific category.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Return matter types by category type, where 0=MatterType (default) and 1=LeadType.

versionId.description: The version id of the activity.

updatedByUserId.description: The id of the user that last updated the activity.

isBillable.description: True if the activity is billable.

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.
If set, rate type must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.
GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.
GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: Sets tax rate to 0 for the entry (e.g. expense).

isDeleted.description: True if the activity is deleted.

updatedByUserId.description: The id of the user making the change.

isBillable.description: True if the activity is billable.

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.
If set, rate type must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.
GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.
GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: Sets tax rate to 0 for the entry (e.g. expense).

type.description:
For USA - one of Corporation, Government Agency, Limited Liability Company, Sole Proprietor, Partnership, Not-for-Profit
For AUS - one of Company, Sole Proprietor, Partnership, Government Department

customName.description: Custom name to use when writing a latter to this contact
Custom name to use when writing a latter to this contact

fileName.description: Full name of the file including the file extension

folderId.description: Id of the folder to add the file to. If null it will be placed in the root folder

dateCreated.description: The original datetime that the file was created. If null the current datetime will be used

fileName.description: Full name of the file including the file extension

folderId.description: Id of the folder to add the file to. If null it will be placed in the root folder

AddAttachmentDto.description: This object holds data for a request to upload an expense attachment.

fileName.description:
The name of the attachment file. Mandatory field.
Accepted file types are: jpeg, jpg, pdf, png.

AddAttachmentInfo.description: Return value for a request to add an expense attachemnt.

expenseId.description: The id of the expense that a file will be uploaded to.

uploadUrl.description: The URL for uploading the file.

versionId.description: The version id of the expense.

createdByUserId.description: The id of the user that created the expense.

staffId.description: The id of the staff member linked to the expense.

matterId.description: The id of the matter that the expense belongs to.

invoiceId.description: The invoice associated to the fee.

activityCode.description: The activity code linked to the fee.

subject.description: The subject - this is a short description of the expense.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1). 
The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars.
Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).
The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

amount.description:
Total amount of the expense. Calculated as Price * Quantity.
This amount ignores GST (if applicable). See Billing.Expenses.API.Resources.Expense.AmountExcTax and Billing.Expenses.API.Resources.Expense.AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.
If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.
If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

tax.description: GST amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.
GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.
GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 
Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description:
True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices
(and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isDeleted.description: True if the expense is deleted.

expenseDate.description: The date of the expense. Mandatory field.

updatedByUserId.description: The id of the user making the change.

staffId.description: The id of the staff member linked to the expense. Mandatory field.

invoiceId.description: The invoice associated to the fee.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the expense. Mandatory field.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1). Must be a non-negative number.
Limited to 2 decimal places.
The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars. Must be a non-negative number.
Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).
The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

tax.description: GST amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.
GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.
GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 
Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description:
True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices
(and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the expense is invoiced externally.

versionId.description: The version id of the fee.

matterId.description: The id of the matter that the fee belongs to.

staffId.description: The id of the staff member linked to the fee.

createdByUserId.description: The id of the user that created the expense.

invoiceId.description: The invoice associated to the fee.

activityCode.description: The activity code linked to the fee.

subject.description: The subject associated to the fee.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true.
Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description:
True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices
(and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

tax.description: GST amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.
GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.
GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

duration.description:
The duration of the fee in minutes.
This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

amount.description:
Total amount of the fee. Calculated using Rate and Duration depending on the fee type.
This amount ignores GST (if applicable). See Billing.Fees.API.Resources.Fee.AmountExcTax and Billing.Fees.API.Resources.Fee.AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.
If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.
If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

isDeleted.description: True if the fee is deleted.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

updatedByUserId.description: The id of the user making the change.

staffId.description: The id of the staff member linked to the fee. Mandatory field.

invoiceId.description: The invoice associated to the fee.

feeDate.description: The date of the fee. Mandatory field.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the fee. Mandatory field.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

duration.description:
The duration of the fee in minutes.
This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

tax.description: GST amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.
GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.
GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 
Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description:
True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices
(and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the fee is invoiced externally.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

isBillable.description: True if the fee source item is billable.
True if the fee source item is billable.

versionId.description: The version id of the invoice.

matterId.description: The id of the matter that the invoice belongs to.

lastUpdatedByUserId.description: The id of the user that last updated the invoice.

issuedDate.description: The date the invoice has been issued.

dueDate.description: The date the invoice is due.

paidDate.description: The date the invoice was paid.

waived.description: True if the invoice is waived.

feeTotal.description: All fees (written off + non written off)

expenseTotal.description: All expenses (written off + non written off)

state.description: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the key/value pair.

externalSystemId.description: Id of this matter in an external system

createdDateUtc.description: Will default to the current datetime
